index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to a model conservation home project; authorizing the Engineering Department and the Department of Housing and Human Services to establish and administer the project in cooperation with a nonprofit corporation; authorizing sale of the land upon which the project will be developed and appropriating sales proceeds for expenses of the I-90 Homeownership Plan; authorizing all necessary contracts for the project; and authorizing the Department of Housing and Human Services to direct the issuance of warrants for up to Forth Six Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($46,500) from the Solid Waste Fund to pay the incremental conservation costs of the project and to make a subordinated loan to a low income person to assist in the purchase of the conservation home, all by a three-fourths vote.
